A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ruined Luke the character. Confused why TFA ideas were scrapped. Who is Snoke\, how can he be around during TCW and OT but nothing explained? Doesn't matter anymore. Who is Rey\, why did Daisy say audience will be touched when we find it? How can someone who has literally no background be so powerful in the force so quickly when Luke was the chosen one's son and it took him years to get a fraction of what Rey can do. She also beats him in a fight. Not once did one lightsaber clashed against another lightsaber in this movie. This is the first Star Wars movie to do this.
